plot: Johnny Cash guides us through the history of the great American railways, while performing some of his most famous train-related songs.
title: Ridin' the Rails: The Great American Train Story
plot_es: Johnny Cash guides us through the history of the great American railways, while performing some of his most famous train-related songs.
original_name: Ridin' the Rails: The Great American Train Story
plot_en: Johnny Cash guides us through the history of the great American railways, while performing some of his most famous train-related songs.
